metadata.title: CVE-2016-7415 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the Locale class in common/locid.cpp inInternational Components for Unicode (ICU) through 57.1 for C/C++ allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a long locale string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7415` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.1').
